name: Hunt or be Hunted (Justin Williams)
description:
Save yourself before you can save the world!

In this VERY early access version of Hunt or be Hunted, take to the night forest against endless waves of Akvats.

Hunt or be Hunted is intended to be an atmospheric action horror first person shooter. 

Available NOW for Mac and Windows!

Currently available: 
  •  Endless horde mode
Coming soon:
  • UI Improvements!!!
  • More advanced hunting enemy AI
  • Variety of enemy types
  • Variety of weapon types
  • Dual wielding pistols
  • Health pickup improvements
  • Additional maps
  • Campaign mode
  • and MUCH more!
